divs: Sighting DetailsThe object glided directly overhead, it wastriangular in shape. It had lights along the perimiter underneath. It seemed tofly a straight course. It made no sound, which led us to believe it was not aplane. It was pretty high up, above sirus clouds, and it was large. Close up itmust have been huge. It wasnt moving very fast, just kinda gliding. First itflew diectly overhead, we actually watched it as it approached. We were in aparking lot as it flew by, and it then flew behind some trees, went above theclouds and disappeared. We waited for it to come out of the clouds but it neverdid.
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Pasadena
There was one other sighting in Pasadena on or around April 13th 2001
